descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff]This mod simply adds a craftable set of light Daedric Armor and a light armored shield[/color]

[color=#00ffff]There is a full outfit bonus for the light armor tree, also there is a No-Helmet Outfit bonus as I know people prefer this armor set without the helmet.[/color]
[b][color=#1e84cc]--Soon i will add a helmet with no texture so i still has the armor but you can see your players face--[/color]
[/b]
[color=#00ffff]To make this armor you will need the perk [/color][color=#ff0000]"Daedric Smithing"[/color][color=#00ffff] and will need to be at a [/color][color=#ff0000]forge.[/color]

[color=#00ffff]----- Light Helmet -----[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Armor Rating: 15[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Weight: 15[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Crafted With: 1 Daedra Heart, 2 Ebony Ingots, 2 Leather Strips[/color]

[color=#00ffff]----- Light Cuirass -----[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Armor Rating: 35[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Weight: 11[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Crafted With:1 Daedra Heart, 3 Ebony Ingots, 2 Leather Strips[/color]

[color=#00ffff]----- Light Gauntlets -----[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Armor Rating: 11[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Weight: 2[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Crafted With: 1 Daedra Heart, 1 Ebony Ingots, 2 Leather Strips[/color]

[color=#00ffff]----- Light Boots -----[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Armor Rating: 15[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Weight 6[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Crafted With: 1 Daedra Heart, 2 Ebony Ingots, 2 Leather Strips[/color]

[color=#00ffff]----- Light Shield -----[/color]

[color=#00ffff]Armor Rating: 21[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Weight: 5[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Crafted With: 1 Daedra Heart, 2 Ebony Ingots, Leather Strips[/color]

[color=#00ffff]----- All are Improved with an Ebony Ingot the same as the heavy armor -----[/color]

[color=#1e84cc]----- No DLC's required. -----
----- Should be compatible with re-texture mods. -----
----- Should there be any questions or problems just ask in the comments section -----
Enjoy:)
[/color]
author: Coope
